title: Hextech Crafting
body: After i up Lvl5 i don't take a Hextech Crafting Chest! My friend weith who i play take bu i don't! PLS RIOT......

replies.body: Sometimes there can be a bit of a delay in getting your level 5 Hextech chest and key. Give it a bit of time to show up and let me know if they're still missing.
